title: CHAPTER I. THE TRAIN FOR CHICAGO.

book.title: The Train Boy
book.description: 简介： The four o'clock afternoon train from Milwaukee, bound for Chicago, had just passed Truesdell, when the train boy passed through the cars with a pile of magazines under his arm....
